subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Patriots’ ineffectiveness without tight end Aaron Hernandez, who was lost to injury, and the diminished role of Wes Welker show an offense in transition.
snippet: The Patriots’ ineffectiveness without tight end Aaron Hernandez, who was lost to injury, and the diminished role of Wes Welker show an offense in transition.
